text: Yoichi District in Shiribeshi Subprefecture. is a district located in Shiribeshi Subprefecture, Hokkaido, Japan. As of 2004, the district has an estimated population of 28,213 and a density of 47.93 persons per km². The total area is 588.64 km². ==Towns and villages== *Akaigawa *Niki *Yoichi Category:Districts in Hokkaido
title: Yoichi District, Hokkaido
